reference.title: Setting index paths
reference.shortdesc: The path for the index files can be configured with POST /nodes/self/controller/settings.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p: The path for the index files is configured with the index_path parameter.

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: curl -X POST -u [admin]:[password] -d index_path=[index file and path] http://[localhost]:8091/nodes/self/controller/settings

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: POST /nodes/self/controller/settings HTTP/1.1 Host: localhost:8091 Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8 Authorization: Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW4= Content-Length: xx path=/var/tmp/test_indexpath

section.title: Response codes
section.p: The HTTP response contains the response code and optional error message:
section.note: If you try to set the data path at this endpoint, the following error displays: ERROR: unable to init 10.3.4.23 (400) Bad Request {u'error': u'Changing data of nodes that are part of provisioned cluster is not supported'}
